description: Number of noncaterpillar trees on n nodes (A000055-A005418).
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..750
maple: with(numtheory):b:= proc(n) option remember; `if`(n<=1, n,      (add(add(d*b(d), d=divisors(j))*b(n-j), j=1..n-1))/(n-1))    end:a:= n-> b(n) -(add(b(k) *b(n-k), k=0..n)-`if`(irem(n, 2)=0,        b(n/2), 0))/2 -ceil(2^(n-4) + 2^(iquo(n-2, 2)-1)):seq(a(n), n=1..40); # _Alois P. Heinz_, May 18 2013
mathematica: b[n_] := b[n] = If[n <= 1, n, (Sum[Sum[d*b[d], {d, Divisors[j]}]*b[n - j], {j, 1, n-1}])/(n-1)]; a[n_] := b[n] - (Sum[b[k]*b[n-k], {k, 0, n}] - If[ Mod[n, 2] == 0, b[n/2], 0])/2 - Ceiling[2^(n-4) + 2^(Quotient[n-2, 2] - 1)]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 40}] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Feb 19 2016, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
extensions: a(14) and up from _Eric W. Weisstein_, Jul 17 2004.
